name: Be an Archer
description:
Playing Be an Archer you will find a game with a simple and easy to understand mechanics, which makes it perfect for any type of player, and at the same time a game with a medium difficulty.

In Be the Archer you will find a series of rounds, in which you will have to defend the watchtower on which the archer is.
The enemies that appear will always go directly to the tower, and from different directions, since the towers will always be surrounded by several accesses for the enemies.


Apart from that, there are several types of enemies, which not only change their appearance, but can also be more or less resistant.
When you get a shot in the head of an enemy, there will be a special camera where you can see in more detail the shot, in a kind of "repetition"
And as if that were not enough, there are several types of unlockable archers, with different abilities, and that you can unlock with the currency of the game, which you will get playing.
